member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMANDS
member.summary: Provides data for calls to when the feature specified is . Retrieves the list of video extension commands from the driver.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMANDS.NodeIndex
member.summary: In multi-adapter operation, this indicates which physical adapter of the device this operation applies to.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMANDS.CommandCount
member.summary: The supported number of video extension commands. This value must be the count returned by a call to with specified as the feature.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMANDS.pCommandInfos
member.summary: Receives a list of structures describing video extension commands.
